name: Mini Golf Venture
description:
It’s adventure time! Grab your golf stick and let us head to the mini golf course to play. Mini Golf Star Venture is a FREE golfing game for all ages. This is the chance to prove that you can handle even the most difficult golf course and score some hole in ones! Once you’ve conquered all the challenges in this game, then you truly have Tiger Woods golf skill.

People love to play golf so much, no matter their golf handicap. Even in gulf states where grass is sparse, they will love to take their golf stick and go on golfing. That is why golfing games on iOS devices such as Flappy Golf is so popular. In real life, people will follow the WGT Golf or World Golf Tour. Many people also love US Open Golf games. Aside from real golf, people love to have fun by playing mini golf. Every kids and adults love them. The rules are almost the same, but the courses are smaller. However, these mini golf courses are no less challenging than real ones. You don’t have to buy expensive sports equipment and certainly not golden1 golf stick, to play mini golf or worry about golf handicaps. Just join in and have fun!

===============================================================
TOP FEATURES OF MINI GOLF STAR VENTURE – 3D MINI WORLD GOLF TOUR:
===============================================================
• Play this fun, addictive game for FREE!
• Beautiful and realistic 3D graphic that will immerse you in the game.
• Four mini golf courses to choose from with different environments.
• We provide 25 ball skins to entertain you.
• Simple game control
• Realistic physic movement
• Turn the sound On or Off

*** How to Play Mini Golf Star Venture: ***
1. Enter a golf course to start playing.
2. When you start, you will be asked to place the ball. Tap on the Right or Left button to adjust the position of the ball.
3. Adjust the direction by tapping Right or Left button.
4. Adjust the power or strength of hit by tapping the + or – button.
5. Tap on HIT BALL when you are ready to hit the ball.
6. See the ball rolling. Hopefully you will score a hole in one. However, if you are not, just repeat above process.
7. Try to finish with as few moves as possible. Fewer moves mean higher score. The highest score is if you can put the ball into the hole with just one move. This is called “hole in one”.

You can access Golf Course no 1 for FREE. There are three more courses to explore and conquer. You can Unlock all courses with in-app purchase.
So, if you really want to train and have Tiger Woods golf skills, play our golfing game now!
---
NOTE:
We try to engage our players and we need your input about how to improve our game.
We hope you enjoy our golfing game as much as we did when we created this game. This was not a typical flappy golf or real WGT game, but we do hope you like it. Please leave us a rating and review to show your support for us. We really appreciate it and we promise we will keep improving this game to make our users happy!
